synopsis.text:
He stepped into the world after Armageddon, a time of chaos and destruction, as Abel Nightroad, a devoted priest and a Crusnik, a vampire with an insatiable thirst for the blood of his own kind. In this post-apocalyptic era, humanity is locked in a relentless struggle against the vampires, known as the Methuselah. To shield humanity from these bloodthirsty creatures, the Vatican turns to unconventional alliances, with Abel serving as a crucial member of the elite AX unit, under the command of Cardinal Catherina Sforza.

Abel's life takes a dramatic turn when he crosses paths with a young girl named Esther Blanchett, whose fate becomes intertwined with his own. As they journey together, the shadows of a forgotten past begin to resurface, threatening to shatter the fragile peace that exists between the humans and the Methuselah.

With the sinister Rosenkreuz Order, led by Abel's twin brother Cain, determined to reignite the war and seize control, Abel and Esther must confront the dark forces that lurk in the shadows. Their mission is not only to safeguard humanity but also to confront the demons of their own pasts. In this treacherous world, the line between friend and foe blurs, and the only hope for survival lies in the unity of vampires and humans against a common enemy.
